name: A ring of oozing cysts
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It decreases the users charisma impossibly much.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'fell insights'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'ruinous utterance'.
